alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Colorado; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL COLORADO...SOUTHERN WHARTON...JACKSON AND NORTHWESTERN MATAGORDA COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pierce to 8 miles east of Ganado to near Lolita. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Campo, Edna, Ganado, La Ward, Pierce, Lolita, Cordele, Vanderbilt, Louise, Midfield, Nada, Morales, Lake Texana Dam, and Danevang. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Colorado; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
